name: The Drawing Board (David Schlaepfer)
description:
A lil doodlin' app for Panic’s Playdate console. Use the crank to steer your pencil to all sorts of artistic heights! Includes optional old-timey tunes to inspire you.

I'm planning on continuing to develop this lil doodlin' app. Potential future features include...

• saving images to a fancy gallery!
• fill tool!
• different pencil sizes!
• undo!

That being said, I'm not really a coder and I'm mostly stumbling my way through this project in my spare time, so give these things a generous timeline in your mind. ;)

I'm not doing this for a living so donations are appreciated but not necessary at all!
